thread.title: 50 Best Craft Brewers in America: Did Your Favorite Make the List? (Infographic)
thread.title_full: 50 Best Craft Brewers in America: Did Your Favorite Make the List? (Infographic)

author: Entrepreneur Staff
title: 50 Best Craft Brewers in America: Did Your Favorite Make the List? (Infographic)
text:
50 Best Craft Brewers in America: Did Your Favorite Make the List? (Infographic) Drink in this list of the top-selling beer makers in the country. Image credit: Brewers Association --- Shares March 15, 2017 
The Brewers Association , a not-for-profit trade group representing small and independent craft brewers, released its annual lists of the top 50 craft brewing companies based on sales volume. If you're not pleased with your favorite's spot in the ranking, go out and buy more beer. Can you think of a better way to support small business?
